name: John Thomas “Thomas Stirling” Sinclair
inscription:
Rememberance of
ANNE SINCLAIR
who died on the 6th June 1887
aged 55 years.
____________________
WE KNOW THAT SHE WE LOVED SO WELL
FROM SORROW PASSED MID JOY TO DWELL
FROM PAIN TO BLISS FROM GLOOM TO LIGHT
FROM A SHODOWY HOME TO MANSIONS BRIGHT
~~~~~~
ALSO
THOMAS SINCLAIR
WHO DIED IN MELBOURNE
10th MAY 1906 AGED 72 YEARS
citation: Find a Grave, database and images (https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/148814973/john-thomas-sinclair: accessed 27 July 2022), memorial page for John Thomas “Thomas Stirling” Sinclair (16 Feb 1834–16 May 1906), Find a Grave Memorial ID 148814973, citing Tallangatta Cemetery, Tallangatta, Towong Shire, Victoria, Australia; Maintained by Dale Thomas (Lawther) (contributor 48787655).
